shotgun noun [C]
(GUN)

shotgun noun [C]
(IN VEHICLE)
mainly US informal used to refer to the seat next to the driver in a car or other vehicle: The kids took turns riding shotgun. "Shotgun!", she shouted, and jumped into the passenger seat. Has anyone called shotgun? If not, I do!
